titleStmt.title: Articles concerning the yeelding of the cittie of Grenoble into the Kings obedience agreed vpon betweene the Lord Desdiguiers, and the committies of the countrey. Togither with the besieging and yeelding vp of Chartres. Faithfully translated out of the French coppie printed at Tours, by E.A.
Articles accordés sur le faict de la reddition de la ville de Grenoble. English.
titleStmt.author: Aggas, Edward.

titleStmt.title: Articles concerning the yeelding of the cittie of Grenoble into the Kings obedience agreed vpon betweene the Lord Desdiguiers, and the committies of the countrey. Togither with the besieging and yeelding vp of Chartres. Faithfully translated out of the French coppie printed at Tours, by E.A.
Articles accordés sur le faict de la reddition de la ville de Grenoble. English.
titleStmt.author: Aggas, Edward.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Wolfe, and are to be solde at his shop right ouer against the great south doore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Edward Aggas, of: Articles accordés sur le faict de la reddition de la ville de Grenoble.
"The besieging and yeelding vp of Chartres on the 19. day of Aprill. 1591" has caption title.
Reproduction of the original in the Peterborough Cathedral. Library.

person.persName: Lesdiguières, François de Bonne, duc de,
